name: Homo Idlecus
description:
Set off on a journey into the Idle World with Idlecus.
Fight quickly and easily to farm items
and evolve your Idlecus without ever stopping.
Explore unique-looking dungeons and battle powerful Boss monsters
to get various types of loot.
Sealed legendary items are waiting for their new masters.
Join now and meet your Homo Idlecus!
